long_description: The Thule Thru-Axle Adapter allows you to mount your 15mm front suspension bike to any Thule fork-mounted carrier. It works with most other brands of fork-mounted bike carriers as well. Simply install the adapter on your existing fork-mounted bike rack. The Thule Thru-Axle Adapter is constructed of durable materials for added stability.
short_description: The Thule Thru-Axle Adapter allows you to mount your 15mm front suspension bike to any Thule fork-mounted carrier. It works with most other brands of fork-mounted bike carriers as well.
